channel.title: How do i add mysterious box
channel.description:
i want to add mysterious box like paradisescape how do i do that?
with random item comes up when u click,

item.title: How do i add mysterious box
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Uh, i actually never thought of this. But I’ll give it a shot.

if (misc.random(10) == 1) {
addItem(ID, 1);
}
if (misc.random(10) == 2) {
addItem(ID, 1);
}
if (misc.random(10) == 3) {
addItem(ID, 1);
}

// etc etc

I’m sure there’s a method of throwing back an int randomly I just can’t remember it, I’ll edit the post if I can.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add mysterious box
